Reviews.Title: 20 hours in the water, still works!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tony  E.
Reviews.Content: While fishing in the river that runs thru my property, I dropped my "CASIO C781 RAVINE 2" into the river. It was about 8:30 PM and getting dark. I was unable to find it. The next day I was not able to go into the river with goggles, to try and find it until about 4:30 PM. After searching a few minutes, with the help of my 17 year old daughter, Sophie, We found my phone. As I lifted it up out of the water it instantly started receiving Text Messages that I was sent during the day, and it was working perfectly! I could not believe it! It was in water that was only about 2 1/5 to 3 feet deep, but still pretty impressive. Try that with your  fancy IPHONE!!

Reviews.Title: Wrong item
Reviews.Author: Jim A
Reviews.Content: The cell phone itself is excellent. Very rugged & sound.  I would have no problem with the item itself if I had been sent the item I ordered. I have a big problem with the transaction. I ordered this item from Megadeal-a 3rd party seller. The item states no camera in two places. Where I work, I cannot have a camera phone. When the item arrived, it had a camera. I contacted Amazon who put me in contact with Megadeal. I was informed there was a 15% restocking fee and I would be responsible for paying the postage. After a number of e-mails, The transaction did not get any better.  I do not think this is acceptable. Buyer beware.........

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Justin Quigley "Justin Quigley"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice rugged phone. I have purchased about 75 of these phones for my maintenance crew and have not had one go bad yet and it has almost been 1 year.

Reviews.Title: Nice 3G phone
Reviews.Author: charles
Reviews.Content: Described as used but "like new" which it was. Shipped on time, met my expectations. This is a great phone to anyone who wants a rugged phone that can take a few "tumbles'" and doesn't care that its a 3G phone. It comes in 2 versions: one with a camera, and the other without one.

Reviews.Title: WOULD PURCHASE AGAIN
Reviews.Author: Travis Moon
Reviews.Content: Very pleased does exactly what was advertised good phone makes a great phone for student athlete durable we are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding phone !!!!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth L. Bensley
Reviews.Content: This phone was everything it advertised to be.  It was in very good shape and it works perfectly.  The seller was outstanding.  They answered my questions promptly.  I will buy from them again !!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent ruggedness, horrible firmware.
Reviews.Author: David Seal
Reviews.Content: I give this unit one star for the chassis, as it is truly rugged, water resistant, tough, and durable.I have had the phone for 3 years, never had a problem with the physical attributes. And the G'z Suite of built-in auxillary features is also very useful. Good battery life, too.  Where it really falls down bad is on it's every day functionality in regards to the firm-ware. For example:1. I want to program the big red button on the side for one function: to mute the ringer when the phone is closed and in my pocket and ringing during a business meeting. One can program the big red button to do almost ANYTHING except that function!. To mute the ringer, one MUST open the phone and push the "quiet" button. Bad form for most instances when I need this feature.2. I want to block a few phone numbers, at least send them directly to voicemail, never want to answer them. Cannot block phone numbers on this telephone, not at any level.3. I NEVER want to use the voice recognition feature, nor do I want my phone to turn on in my pocket and start talking to me. NEVER. Can I disable or turn this function off so it does not work, even accidentally? Not that I can find. Default setting is "on".4. I NEVER want to use the PTT funtion, and I don't want it clogging up my numbers list, either. I will never use this function, think it should be removed from all telephones. They do allow me to turn this feature off, but the default is on, and all PTT entries that are already in there must be removed manually.5. The auto-focus on the camera has never worked right, not even once. Blurry pictures almost every time, unless in full daylight.6. I do not want the outer window to display the number or person I am currently talking to while I have the phone on my ear. Privacy issues abound.7. Often, when I push the camera on button, it loads up the web browser instead. Not always, just enough to be frustrating.8. A clock with a seconds display of somekind would be most helpful. I am a radio broadcast engneer, and being even a few seconds off can cause problems. 10 seonds doesn't seem like much, unless we are talking silence and dead air. And the clock should be visible even when I am talking on it. No, especially then!9. I want a setting where it both rings and vibrates. I am sometimes in an area when I cannot hear event he loudest ring. You must choose one or the other, cannot get both at the same time.You might think I am nit-picking, but the phone I had before this, an old Samsung that lasted me almost 5 years, operatered just the way I wanted it too, always got signal, had better battery life. The charging jack broke, or I would still be using it instead of this high-priced example of poor firmware writing skills.

Reviews.Title: Casio was just what I was looking for-
Reviews.Author: R M Pettway
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cell phone that was rugged to replace my Samsong that I purchased from Verizon over a year ago.  I have been very happy with my Casio G'zOne C781 phone.

Reviews.Title: company sold me a knock off it seems like
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Raetz
Reviews.Content: The phone drops calls and then restarts itself, the casing is already starting to fall apart after 30 days. The Ravine 1 is better.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Tim Berube
Reviews.Content: I had the predissessor to this one for three years and it was a hand me down when I recieved it. Great phone. I expect the same great service from this one.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Lisa Duda
Reviews.Content: EASY TO USE & DURABLE. IT IS EXACTLY WHAT WE WANTED. I WOULD LOVE TO PURCHASE ONE FOR MY SON TOO!

Reviews.Title: Not as good as described
Reviews.Author: Melissa Lowe
Reviews.Content: Makes and receives calls and texts, but trying to take a picture is another thing.  The camera lens is scratched to the point the camera is useless and for my job, this is unacceptable.  Having to look for another phone after already buying one just so I can continue to do my job.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Pennydimuro
Reviews.Content: We like the phone a lot but battery does not stay charged. Have to charge like everyday or day in half. Overall the phone is very durable for construction.

Reviews.Title: Blah
Reviews.Author: BrandiJo Bailey
Reviews.Content: The screen will flip up-side-down all the time along with the screen going black... It sounds like the person who you're talking to is on the moon... Very unsatisfied

Reviews.Title: What I think of the Casio G'zOne
Reviews.Author: Dicky Tomasyan
Reviews.Content: It's great, rugged...simple to use, no bleeps and bloops. I got my I-Pad handy if I need to get online. I like it.

Reviews.Title: Solid phone
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: Takes a while to get used to after having an android but, I wanted a phone to use primarily for talk and text. This phone has filled the bill admirably. As a gardener and outdoorsman it is nice to have minimal worries about shock and moisture. I am rather large and the phone did not fit my hands really well but after a few weeks, I do not have any difficulty using the phone at all.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Michelle Hale
Reviews.Content: the phone is not very loud at all on its Tones ,very low in sounds not much to say about this phone .

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a replacement for my iphone to lose the high bills, my girlfriend confiscated the phone and I just bought a second one for me. These are good basic phones, you can talk and text and the cost is half of a smart phone

Reviews.Title: Casio G'zOne C781
Reviews.Author: Thomas Malcolm Mitchell
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is Great, a very well made phone. The con....its locked to Verizon Wireless, it cant be used outside of The USA without first unlocking the GSM slot.....I hear you....I hear you...a code can be purchased on line,....but this isn't easy. Ive tried several sites and the answer is the same...NO CAN DO. I have sent a mail to Verizon asking for help, but I'm not holding my breath.Why anyone would allow a phone ( locked to a wireless network in the USA and that cannot be used other than in the states ), to be shipped overseas is beyond me. Knowing this  I would not have bought this phone. Its a crying shame, because I love the phone.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever
Reviews.Author: Eli B. Talamantes
Reviews.Content: Because its every thing you need in phone ,i think it's # 1 of phones,for the line of work that i do,

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: Larry T.
Reviews.Content: No camera and the screen goes dark and I have to turn it off and on several times to get the useable screen to come back on  Can I return it and get my money back?

ProductInfo.Features:
Your purchase will include a Cell Phone, Rechargable Battery, and Wall Charger \\*** This phone has a camera ***////
Astronomy calendar, compass, thermometer, a sunrise and sunset app, a tide tracker, a pedometer, and a star gazing app
1.4-inch, 128-by-128-pixel, passive matrix display on the outside, and a 2.2-inch, active matrix, 240-by-320-pixel internal display
Built to Military Specifications; Dust, Water, Shock Resistant; Ruggedized Design
Dual-band EV-DO Rev. A (850/1900 MHz) and quad-band EDGE (850/900/1800/1900 MHz) compatibility; LED Light
ProductInfo.Name: Casio G'zOne C781 Ravine 2 cell phone for Verizon (Black) Rugged - Water Resistant
